thread.section_title: Medical Guardian Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Medical Guardian | www.medicalguardian.com
thread.title: Dan

author: Dan
title: Dan
text: My dad used the Guardian and while he was alive was a good experience. The issue I need to share with everyone is I can't return the units and get my refund. I keep calling and ask for the RMA, they say I will gat an email with the information but it never comes. I asked for it to be mailed and still it hasn't come. Such a shame to add another problem with all the other problems one has to deal with after their last surviving parent passes away.
